title: Vinegar; Preparation or purification thereof
definition_statement: This place covers: Any vinegar , i.e. from fermentation processes, synthetic vinegar based on synthetic acetic acid, and methods for the preparation thereof, including purification.

title: from wine
definition_statement: This place covers: Methods for preparing vinegar from wine and wine vinegar prepared thereby.

title: from alcohol
definition_statement: This place covers: Methods for preparing vinegar from alcohol and vinegar prepared thereby.

title: from milk
definition_statement: This place covers: Methods for preparing vinegar from milk and vinegar prepared thereby.

title: Addition of flavouring ingredients
definition_statement: This place covers: Methods for preparing vinegar by addition of flavouring ingredients and flavoured vinegar prepared thereby.

title: Apparatus
definition_statement: This place covers: Apparatus for preparing vinegar.
